children.text: The rainhead in this area has not been sealed, creating a weak point in the gutter design that is susceptible to leaking.
The Victorian Building Authority’s Box Gutter Design Fact Sheet states that
‘Box gutters must be sealed to rainheads and sumps’ .
This rainhead in this area must be properly sealed to avoid leaking in accordance with the VBA’s requirements and Australian Standard AS 3500 – Plumbing and Drainage.
